item.title: Solutions to infra-exercises I
item.description: These are S’s solutions for the first set of infra-Bayesian exercises. Spoilers, of course! I decree this a Moore method problem set! That means you’re allowed to be as pedantic about definitions as you like, and I commit to addressing your pedantry. Please shoot me an email if there’s a way I can improve this document’s rigor and/or clarity! Notes When the document says monotone, it means what most analysis textbooks call increasing.
